item.title: Meteorite hits Russia
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:26, topic:485940”]If you attend them at the stadium, but you don’t have to. They’re free on tv lol.

Superbowl tickets are the only exception, and the super bowl is free on tv also.[/quote]
Pretty much. I can sit on my ass at home and watch football all weekend and the only thing I have to do is pay my service provider. The only ones making real money is the provider and the owner of sunchips.

item.title: Meteorite hits Russia
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:24, topic:485940”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=604172.msg4226624#msg4226624 date=1361036126]
Elrick: They earn a lot of money because stupid people (Americans) pay a lot to watch it. “Football” teams are corporations just like BP and Goldman Sachs. Shooting down meteorites isn’t profitable.
[/quote]
You’re a loveing retard. You don’t pay anything to watch it. They make their money through endorsements/commercials during the game dumbvagina.

Please post more things you don’t understand about America/think we’re stupid for so I can tell you why it is the way it is. Government and overwhelming ignorant “patriots” are one thing but in general everyones the same.[/quote]
They don’t sell tickets to the matches?

Read full topic

item.title: Meteorite hits Russia
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Bowser jr:

Elrick: They earn a lot of money because stupid people (Americans) pay a lot to watch it. “Football” teams are corporations just like BP and Goldman Sachs. Shooting down meteorites isn’t profitable.

I know why it continues, I just don’t agree with it at all and am bothered by the fact that not only just America, but the entire world is consuming so much that this world is not going to last much longer. I’m also pro child licensing, where would be parents should be required to take some form of test to show that they are psychologically and economically capable of child rearing. Also child restriction, as just about everywhere is overpopulated and we need to start restricting how many family members there can be made. However that is not the topic at hand lol. We just need to start getting our act together as a whole and realize that we’re in a hole right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Meteorite hits Russia
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:20, topic:485940”][quote author=Elrick link=topic=604172.msg4224800#msg4224800 date=1360960941]

2/16/12 Nasa funding fully re-instated.

13*

Lol thanks for the fix, I’m stuck in the past :p.

But seriously, if they were never able to see this coming at all then we really need to start cutting stupid stuff like… sports? It blows my mind how we cut extremely important funding for programs like these and yet we pump billions of dollars in America to pay for sports games.
[/quote]

coming from a nerd that sucks at all sports.[/quote]
You honestly think we should be playing people who have naturally better genetics than us for… No reason? They move a ball around and that entitles them to millions of dollars a year? That makes no sense at all. It would make much more sense to idolize people who actually make a difference in the world and actually contribute to society. Take Nascar for example. Why are we paying them that much? So they can drive around in circles and waste our resources to do so, and once in a while the highlight is someone crashing? No, the world is incredibly ass backwards and we’re not even slowly, but rather quickly depleting the earth’s resources when we should be putting a much bigger emphasis on that in society.

And no, I wrestled in High School and enjoy physical activities very much. However I don’t think anyone who does something like that as a living deserves to be paid much more than people who actually contribute to society.

Read full topic
